hero.f: I create one-page and multi-page websites with adaptive layout and built-in interactive elements.
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Developer from Uzbekistan, Tashkent. I create web applications from scratch using modern technologies. My experience includes developing user interfaces, server logic, and databases.
about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Kamoliddin Tukhtaboev, a beginner fullstack developer with a focus on backend (Python) and creating Telegram bots, web applications and automated solutions. My focus is user experience, performance and clean code. In my projects, I use modern technologies and practices, striving to make the product not just working, but understandable, scalable and useful.

project.gif-finder.info: A telegram bot for easy searching gifs
project.weather-bot.info: Weather-Bot is a chatbot designed to provide current weather information
